body_html:
Hello
I have a CNN in which the input is the Complexed-valued and the labels are double and it is for the regression task. I've implemented it using Tensorflow. But it does not work. Here, I read other people's notes. and I saw the https://gist.github.com/gautamsreekumar/81bf1ad1037ccfc5dfa8da1be28f2216 . I wonder is it enough for implementing such a network. I mean how should I define the optimizer and the cost or other related parts? just as the same as the conventional CNN which implements on a normal domain like tf.float32?
Thanks

body:
Hello 
I have a CNN in which the input is the Complexed-valued and the labels are double and it is for the regression task. I've implemented it using Tensorflow. But it does not work. Here, I read other people's notes. and I saw the https://gist.github.com/gautamsreekumar/81bf1ad1037ccfc5dfa8da1be28f2216 . I wonder is it enough for implementing such a network. I mean how should I define the optimizer and the cost or other related parts? just as the same as the conventional CNN which implements on a normal domain like tf.float32?
Thanks
